          <title>
            <string language="en">Reducing friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringern von von Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduction du frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reduzindo a fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riduzione dell'attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μείωση της τριβής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reducción de la fricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how to reduce the friction in the wheels of a bike using a lubricating oil or grease.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wheels</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie man die Friktion in 
den Rädern eines Fahrrades mit einem Schmieröl oder einem Fett 
verringert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment réduire le 
frottement dans les roues d'un vélo en utilisant une huile de 
graissage ou une graisse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como reduzir a fricção
nas rodas de uma bicicleta usando um óleo lubrificando ou uma graxa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come ridurre 
l'attrito nelle rotelle di una bici usando un olio lubrificante o un 
grasso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς να μειώσει την 
τριβή στις ρόδες ενός ποδηλάτου χρησιμοποιώντας ένα λαδώνοντας 
πετρέλαιο ή ένα λίπος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo reducir la 
fricción en las ruedas de una bici usando un aceite lubricante o una 
grasa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fett</string>
          </keyword>
